short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beautiful Clouds Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Beautiful Clouds background. Beautiful Clouds wallpaper theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Rotate Beautiful Clouds wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Toggle or favorite Beautiful Clouds backgrounds from the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. New Note feature for jotting down tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited sites.
8. Simplified access to bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing favorite sites quickly.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Explore additional themes easily.
12. Streamlined sharing to social networks.
13. One-click wallpaper downloads.
14. Quick access to gaming.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks in the Beautiful Clouds new tab.
